name: Vehicle File
summary: Vehicle file used by Star Wars Jedi Knight: Jedi Academy, a Star Wars game where the player chooses to have their Jedi character choose the light or dark side path; contains data for vehicles that are accessed throughout the game, such as the different driving capabilities of the vehicle.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Raven Software Star Wars Jedi Knight: Jedi Academy
